name: Bonbons
author: Diane
summary: This recipe was made by my mother only around Christmas time.  Now, I carry on the tradition of this sweet confection.
directions: In large bowl, combine margarine, confectioners' sugar, condensed milk, coconut, chopped walnuts and vanilla
Cover and chill in the refrigerator for 2 hours, or until mixture has thickened enough to roll into balls
Roll the mixture into 1-inch balls and place close together, but not touching, on cookie sheets
While bonbons are freezing, line a cookie sheet or flat surface with waxed paper
Combine chocolate chips and shortening in the top of a double boiler, over, not in, simmering water
Using a toothpick or a fork, dip each bonbon in the melted chocolate
Place on waxed paper to dry
When chocolate has hardened, store bonbons in plastic bag in the freezer
